attributes.action: sack Mr Malcolm Jack, the accounting officer for the House of Commons Fees Office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instruct the Prime Minister to put more pressure and sack all the staff in the fees office and bring the accounting officer of the House of Commons fees office, Mr Malcolm Jack to be held liable and accountable for gross misconduct and abuse of his position by wrongfully/fraudulently authorising tax payers monies as MP's expenses.

Also ask Prime Minister to have Malcolm Jack investigated personally, for the £100,000.00 makeover at his No.3 Parliament Street, London property in 2006.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
